channel.title: LNG Demand on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in LNG Demand on FinanClub

item.title: ET
item.description: score:166 Chances: Energy Transfer LP (ET) is ready to make another acquisition if the right opportunity arises. Energy Transfer LP shares have started gaining and might continue moving higher in the near term, as indicated by solid earnings estimate revisions. Shell expects LNG demand to grow over 50% by 2040, which should benefit project developers.
